english_translation: Don't stay away, don't rush, don't wither, don't get angry;
Earn the affection and love of the world with kindness.

kannada_original: ತೆಗಳಿದರೆ ಬರಿ ಕಲಹ, ಕದಡಿದರೆ ಬಲು ರಾಡಿ ;
english_transliteration: Tegaḷidare bari kalaha, kadadidare balu rāḍi ;
english_translation: If you criticize, it's just conflict, if you stir it up, it's great mess;
Through laughter comes peace! – Dear Rama.
